data.text:
Congrats on getting a trainer~! 
You did it! I'm really happy for you!
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Congrats on getting a trainer~! 
󠁿You did it! I'm really happy for you!

data.text:
Thanks alot! 
Looks like I need to work harder from now on, huh?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Thanks alot! 
󠁿Looks like I need to work harder from now on, huh?

data.text:
Class Rep Top Road, you're always helping me with studying 
and training, so I'm hoping your races will be a big success~!
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Class Rep Top Road, you're always helping me with studying 
󠁿and training, so I'm hoping your races will be a big success~!

data.text:
Ehehe. Class Rep Top Road, I really love your running. 
Just watching makes me excited and raises my motivation……
 that's why I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Ehehe. Class Rep Top Road, I really love your running. 
󠁿Just watching makes me excited and raises my motivation……
󠁿 that's why I'm looking forward to it.

data.text:
I'm glad! I'll run alot! 
Well……because it makes me happy too!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿I'm glad! I'll run alot! 
󠁿Well……because it makes me happy too!

data.text:
For the trainer that talked to me, 
I need to do my best for them too……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿For the trainer that talked to me, 
󠁿I need to do my best for them too……!

data.text:
Ah, but they're a rookie right? Hmmmm……for Class Rep Top Road, 
I think it'd be better if a veteran trainer spoke to you.
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, but they're a rookie right? Hmmmm……for Class Rep Top Road, 
󠁿I think it'd be better if a veteran trainer spoke to you.

data.text:
Then, maybe you could have started racing right away, 
right? Maybe it would have been better to not 
respond so quickly, and hold out for a bit longer~.
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Then, maybe you could have started racing right away, 
󠁿right? Maybe it would have been better to not 
󠁿respond so quickly, and hold out for a bit longer~.

data.text: Hold out……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Hold out……

data.text:
(…………At that time, Trainer-san just stood 
there with their mouth open didn't they?)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(…………At that time, Trainer-san just stood 
󠁿there with their mouth open didn't they?)

data.text:
(I was really happy so I answered immediately but, 
maybe that's not how it usually goes……)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(I was really happy so I answered immediately but, 
󠁿maybe that's not how it usually goes……)

data.text:
(Does it normally just start with meeting each 
other? Getting to know one another, maybe I 
needed to take the time to think about that?)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(Does it normally just start with meeting each 
󠁿other? Getting to know one another, maybe I 
󠁿needed to take the time to think about that?)

data.text:
But, I……don't regret it and 
I think I'm glad I accepted it……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿But, I……don't regret it and 
󠁿I think I'm glad I accepted it……

data.text:
After all, Trainer-san, out of all the other 
Uma Musume around, they chose to speak to me.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿After all, Trainer-san, out of all the other 
󠁿Uma Musume around, they chose to speak to me.

data.text:
(Opera O-chan, and Ayabe-san too. So many talented Uma Musume. 
But out of all of those, Trainer-san chose me)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(Opera O-chan, and Ayabe-san too. So many talented Uma Musume. 
󠁿But out of all of those, Trainer-san chose me)

data.text: (……They had expectations for me)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿(……They had expectations for me)

data.text:
……Alright. These feelings, I need to properly convey them to 
Trainer-san! That I won't make them regret choosing me……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿……Alright. These feelings, I need to properly convey them to 
󠁿Trainer-san! That I won't make them regret choosing me……!

data.text:
I'd known she had enrolled in Tracen Academy but…… 
I never would have expected that you'd become her trainer.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿I'd known she had enrolled in Tracen Academy but…… 
󠁿I never would have expected that you'd become her trainer.

data.text:
Way back when I was a coach for a club for Uma Musume kids, 
Top Road was there. Even back then she stood out.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿Way back when I was a coach for a club for Uma Musume kids, 
󠁿Top Road was there. Even back then she stood out.

data.text:
She was a hard-worker, and loved 
running from the bottom of her heart.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿She was a hard-worker, and loved 
󠁿running from the bottom of her heart.

data.text:
Coach! Can I go run one more time!? 
Next time, I think I'll be able to run even faster!
data.name: Young Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Coach! Can I go run one more time!? 
󠁿Next time, I think I'll be able to run even faster!

data.text:
……Huh, huh? It's not going well……but, but! 
One more time! If I do it one more time, then for sure!!
data.name: Young Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿……Huh, huh? It's not going well……but, but! 
󠁿One more time! If I do it one more time, then for sure!!

data.text:
She's a little like you. She's so straight-forward that 
sometimes she's a little awkward. ……But, she doesn't 
give up. She doesn't have the option to give up.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿She's a little like you. She's so straight-forward that 
󠁿sometimes she's a little awkward. ……But, she doesn't 
󠁿give up. She doesn't have the option to give up.

data.text:
It'll be fine. You'll do fine. I believe in you. Work hard like 
you have been up until now, and go get some real experience.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿It'll be fine. You'll do fine. I believe in you. Work hard like 
󠁿you have been up until now, and go get some real experience.

data.text:
I was still an inexperienced youngester. I was aware of that. 
But, if he still had expectations for me then――

choices.text: I just need to study then……!

data.processed:
󠁿I was still an inexperienced youngester. I was aware of that. 
󠁿But, if he still had expectations for me then――

data.text:
Right! For you two, G1's aren't just a dream! 
That awesome scene, I want both of you to show it to me!
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿Right! For you two, G1's aren't just a dream! 
󠁿That awesome scene, I want both of you to show it to me!

data.text: I missed the timing to enter……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿I missed the timing to enter……

data.text:
(But……Trainer-san and Coach already know each other. 
What an amazing coincidence……)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(But……Trainer-san and Coach already know each other. 
󠁿What an amazing coincidence……)

data.text:
(……So Trainer-san was also carrying heavy expectations. 
Even after becoming a pro, still studying hard……)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(……So Trainer-san was also carrying heavy expectations. 
󠁿Even after becoming a pro, still studying hard……)

data.text: ……that's the type of person who chose me.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿……that's the type of person who chose me.

data.text: Then, those feelings……I definitely don't want to betray them.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Then, those feelings……I definitely don't want to betray them.

data.text:
(In the Mock Race that's in a week……there, I need to 
show them my run again. Not with words, but by running, 
so they can be reassured that they chose right.)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(In the Mock Race that's in a week……there, I need to 
󠁿show them my run again. Not with words, but by running, 
󠁿so they can be reassured that they chose right.)

data.text:
With that decided, on to training! I need to get my legs 
ready to take on any training menu that comes my way!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿With that decided, on to training! I need to get my legs 
󠁿ready to take on any training menu that comes my way!

data.text:
Allllright! So I can properly respond to everyone's, 
to Trainer-san's expectations……I'll do my best!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Allllright! So I can properly respond to everyone's, 
󠁿to Trainer-san's expectations……I'll do my best!!

data.text: ――Ah.
data.name: Narita Top Road

data.text:
It's fine to get yourself motivated, but 
is this really the place for that? As usual, 
this part of you is just a little uncool.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
󠁿It's fine to get yourself motivated, but 
󠁿is this really the place for that? As usual, 
󠁿this part of you is just a little uncool.
